summary: An American expatriate in Rome witnesses an attempted murder that is connected to an ongoing killing spree in the city, and conducts his own investigation despite himself and his girlfriend being targeted by the killer.
cast: Tony Musante|Suzy Kendall|Enrico Maria Salerno|Eva Renzi|Umberto Raho|Renato Romano|Giuseppe Castellano|Mario Adorf|Pino Patti|Gildo Di Marco|Rosita Torosh|Omar Bonaro|Fulvio Mingozzi|Werner Peters|Karen Valenti|Carla Mancini|Bruno Erba|Dario Argento|Angelo Casadei|Nestore Cavaricci|Giovanni Di Benedetto|Alfonso Giganti|Silvio Klein|Filippo La Neve|Reggie Nalder|Annamaria Spogli|Maria Tedeschi
keywords: serial killer|mysterious villain|mysterious stranger|american in italy|girlfriend
